alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Klamath Basin; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued June 13 at 2:32PM PDT until June 15 at 7:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures in the upper 20s and as low as 21 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures in the lower 30s are possible. * WHERE...In California, Modoc County, including the communities of Alturas, Canby, and Likely. In Oregon, portions of Klamath and Lake counties, including Klamath Falls, Chiloquin, Modoc Point, Lorella, Midland, Chemult, Crescent, Silver Lake, Bly, Sprague River, Christmas Valley, Beatty, and Lakeview. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coldest low temperatures will occur tonight into early Tuesday morning. Low temperatures will be slightly warmer late Tuesday night and early Wednesday morning, but a period of freezing temperatures is possible. Additionally, frost is likely during these periods. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Klamath Basin; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
